title: No deductions shall be made in the gross area of the corridors, closets or other sub-divisions
clause_text: No deductions shall be made in the gross area of the corridors, closets or other sub-divisions.All space serving the particular assembly occupancy shall be reckoned. The detailed requirements of individual exits at each floor are given below:

source_pdf.text_snippet: No deductions shall be made in the gross area of the corridors, closets or other sub-divisions.All space serving the particular assembly occupancy shall be reckoned.
